name: Monkey.D.Garp
effect: [On Play] You may place 3 {Navy} type cards from your trash at the bottom of your deck in any order: Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to 1 of your Leader. Then, if there is a Character with a cost of 9 or more, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 7 or less.
